item.title: Lambda Logshipper
item.description: How can you easily move your Cloudwatch logstream to another platform or log collector endpoints? The easiest way is to ship the Cloudwatch logstream through a socket client. This is an example of a small Golang lambda function to ship aws cloudwatch log stream to a tcp endpoint. you will need a socket client: func SocketClient(m []byte) { conn, err := net.Dial("tcp", "your_tcp_endpoint:your_port") defer conn.Close() if err != nil { fmt.
